title.narrative: Second Financial Sector Program Cluster - Subprogram 4

description.narrative: The overall impact of the FSP II is a sound, market-based finance sector to enhance resource mobilization and support sustainable economic growth. The expected outcome is a growing, resilient, and efficient financial system. Continuing the reforms initiated under subprograms 1, 2, and 3, subprogram 4 has nine key reform actions (triggers) that the government began implementing in January 2010. At the conclusion of subprogram 4, the following outputs will have been accomplished under the FSP II cluster: (1) Improved Confidence and Financial Intermediation, (2) Maintained Stability in the Finance Sector, (3) Promoted Good Governance, and (4) Enhanced Efficiency in the Finance Sector.
